bug.author: wutaomsft
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The repo's name is forecasting. There is a directory called forecasting_lib. conda env is called forecast In addition, the Jupyter kernel is called forecast. I don't know if most people would prefer to have a single name (e.g., forecast). Would be good to interview users and make a call. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
